resource_dbs.name: American Standard Version (ASV)
resource_dbs.details: English Translation. Known for its literal translation from the original languages.

resource_dbs.name: Berean Study Bible (BSB)
resource_dbs.details: English Translation. Often used for study and comparison, noted for its modern language.

resource_dbs.name: King James Version, Authorized (KJVA)
resource_dbs.details: The primary default English resource used by the SeraphProcessor.

resource_dbs.name: Lexham English Bible (LEB)
resource_dbs.details: English Translation. A formal equivalent translation focused on clarity and consistency.

resource_dbs.name: New English Translation (NET)
resource_dbs.details: English Translation. Features extensive translator notes and is often used for scholarly work.

resource_dbs.name: Morphologically Tagged Greek New Testament (MorphGNT)
resource_dbs.details: Greek Text. Contains morphological data for every word, useful for grammar lookups.

resource_dbs.name: Nestle 1904 Greek New Testament
resource_dbs.details: Greek Text. A public domain critical edition of the Greek New Testament.

resource_dbs.name: SBL Greek New Testament (SBLGNT)
resource_dbs.details: Greek Text. A modern critical edition based primarily on the UBS GNT 5th edition.

resource_dbs.name: Tyndale New Testament (TNT)
resource_dbs.details: Greek Text. An edition of the New Testament following the Tyndale House Greek New Testament principles.

resource_dbs.name: Hebrew Old Testament (Generic)
resource_dbs.details: Contains the Hebrew text, likely the Biblia Hebraica Stuttgartensia (BHS) or Westminster Leningrad Codex (WLC).

resource_dbs.name: Septuagint (LXX)
resource_dbs.details: Contains the Koine Greek translation of the Hebrew Old Testament.
